name: Brainly Life
description:
Brainly Life 

is a small minigame where you play as a brain-part inside a brain and try to control the human outside of the brain.

Produce a task-disk and take it to the control center to change the feelings of the human.

You can play the game in the browser or as a download on Windows.

Can you keep him/her alive?

Controls:
Move - W,A,S,D or arrow keys
Interact - E
(Back to 2016 [titlescreen] - R)
